name: Ankur Rana
title: Senior IC Engineer | Design and Architecture of Scalable Systems
summary: Experienced Golang engineer specializing in building scalable, fault-tolerant systems with a focus on optimizing search solutions for e-commerce platforms. Strong interest in exploring new technologies such as web3 and AI language models. Aims to bring leadership and expertise to teams focused on high performance.

experience.title: Technical Architect
achievements: Optimized Elasticsearch architecture to reduce latency.
Developed an Index Mapping Analyzer for Elasticsearch clusters.
Designed backend systems for e-commerce applications using Golang.
Implemented automated canary deployments for Golang services.
Developed a Linux System Metrics analysis tool for infrastructure optimization.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer 2
achievements: Decomposed a monolithic application into a microservices architecture.
Developed a scalable Node.js application for Dominos Delivery Partners.
Contributed to the Debezium open-source tool by reporting functional and performance issues.

experience.title: Software Engineer
achievements: Solved production issues in a payroll processing application.
